name: gleif-poc-monorepo
description: GLEIF POC Monorepo - vLEI â†” TWIN ID Linkage Verifier

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd gleif-frontend && npm install && cd ../twin-service && npm install && cd ../did-management && npm install && cd ../verification-service && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../did-management && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install git+https://github.com/WebOfTrust/keripy.git
scripts.dev: npm run install:all && npm run dev:vault
scripts.dev:vault: docker run -d --name vault-dev -p 8200:8200 -e VAULT_DEV_ROOT_TOKEN_ID=root hashicorp/vault server -dev && cd verification-service && source venv/bin/activate && python3 app.py & cd twin-service && npm run start:vault & cd gleif-frontend && npm run dev
scripts.clean: cd gleif-frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../twin-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../did-management && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
